name: Name
forgot_password_text: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
registration_completed_successfully_msg: Welcome to Latur Sahar Municipality Portal. Please log in to explore our online services.
home_page_box_register_login_text: Register or log in to access all Latur Sahar Municipality online services and facilities.
home_page_box_view_status_text: View and track the current status of your submitted grievance or service request.
home_page_box_contact_us_text: Contact us for assistance, feedback, or information regarding municipal services.
grievance_success_msg1: Your grievance has been successfully submitted to Latur Sahar Municipality.
grievance_success_msg2_2: for future reference and status tracking.
grievance_success_msg3: Thank you for reaching out — our team will review and respond as soon as possible.
about_us_home_heading: About Latur Sahar Municipality (Latur City Municipal Corporation)
about_us_short_content: Latur City Municipal Corporation (LCMC) is the civic urban body responsible for the city of Latur in Maharashtra. It manages essential infrastructure like roads, water supply, drainage, sanitation, and street lighting for the residents.
about_us_long_content1:
1. Background & Jurisdiction

  • Latur lies on the Balaghat plateau in the Marathwada region of Maharashtra.
  • The Latur City Municipal Corporation (LCMC) was established on 25 October 2011, when the former municipal council was upgraded to corporation status.
  • Head Office: MG Road / Main Road, Latur, Maharashtra – 413512.
about_us_long_content2:
2. Functions & Responsibilities

  • Provides urban civic amenities such as:
    • Water supply and drainage
    • Roads, footpaths, and street-lighting
    • Garbage collection and public sanitation
    • Health services and primary education
  • Collects taxes and fees including property tax, water charges, and licenses..
  • Plans urban development and coordinates with state-level urban development authorities.
about_us_long_content3:
3. Challenges & Context

  • Latur faces semi-arid climate issues, droughts, and groundwater scarcity.
  • Civic issues like irregular garbage disposal and poor road maintenance often affect citizens.
  • Public transport, such as the city bus service, has occasionally faced interruptions due to administrative and funding challenges.
about_us_long_content4:
4. Development & Urban Planning

  • Plans are underway to expand the municipal area by including about 26,541 hectares (≈ 40 villages) to promote urban growth and better infrastructure.
  • Environmental challenges like low forest cover and groundwater stress influence urban planning decisions.
about_us_long_content5:
5. Impact on Citizens

  • LCMC services directly affect daily life—water, cleanliness, transport, and roads.
  • Initiatives such as free bus travel for women have been appreciated but require consistent funding.
  • As Latur grows, the corporation’s role in balancing modernization and sustainability becomes increasingly important.
our_services_short_content: Latur City Municipal Corporation (LCMC) provides essential public services to ensure a clean, safe, and well-planned city. Our main services include water supply, sanitation, road maintenance, solid waste management, public lighting, and health facilities for all citizens.
our_promise_short_content: We are dedicated to making Latur a clean, green, and smart city through efficient services, citizen participation, and transparent governance.
our_services_long_content1:
01.

Water Supply

We ensure regular and safe drinking water distribution to all households, businesses, and public areas within Latur city.
our_services_long_content2:
02.

Solid Waste Management

Daily garbage collection, street cleaning, and scientific waste disposal are managed to keep the city clean and healthy.
our_services_long_content3:
03.

Roads & Infrastructure

LCMC is responsible for construction, repair, and maintenance of city roads, footpaths, bridges, and drainage systems to improve urban mobility.
our_services_long_content4:
04.

Education

The corporation runs and maintains municipal primary schools to provide quality education to every child in the city.
our_services_long_content5:
05.

Street Lighting

We maintain and operate streetlights across all wards to ensure public safety and better visibility during night hours.
our_services_long_content6:
06.

Public Health & Sanitation

Our health department conducts cleanliness drives, disease-control programs, and ensures proper sanitation facilities in all areas.
our_services_long_content7:
07.

Parks & Gardens

We maintain public gardens, playgrounds, and green spaces to enhance the beauty and environment of Latur.
our_services_long_content8:
08.

Urban Planning & Development

LCMC manages city planning, building permissions, and development projects to ensure sustainable and organized urban growth.
faq_content:
• What is Latur Sahar Municipality?

    Latur Sahar Municipality, officially known as Latur City Municipal Corporation (LCMC), is the civic body responsible for managing public services, infrastructure, and urban development in Latur city, Maharashtra.

  • What services does the municipality provide?

    The municipality provides essential services like water supply, sanitation, waste management, street lighting, road maintenance, public health, education, and transport.

  • How can I register on the website?

    You can register by clicking the Register button on the homepage. Fill in your details like name, mobile number, and email to create your account.

  • What can I do after registration?

    Once registered, you can log in to access online services such as grievance submission, status tracking, and information about municipal activities.

  • How do I submit a grievance or complaint?

    After logging in, go to the Submit Grievance section, fill in the required details, and submit your issue. You’ll receive a registration number to track your grievance.

  • How can I check my grievance status?

    Click on View Grievance Status, enter your registration number, and you’ll see the latest update or resolution progress.

  • What should I do if I forget my login password?

    Click on the Forgot Password link on the login page. Enter your registered email or mobile number to reset your password.

  • How can I contact the municipality?

    Visit the Contact Us page to find office addresses, phone numbers, and email IDs. You can also send messages directly through the contact form.

  • What are the office working hours?

    The Latur Sahar Municipality office is usually open Monday to Saturday, from 10:00 AM to 5:30 PM, except on government holidays.

  • How does the municipality ensure cleanliness and sanitation?

    LCMC regularly conducts cleaning drives, door-to-door garbage collection, and public awareness programs under the Swachh Bharat Mission to maintain a clean and healthy city.
